name: template-engine-ts
description: A flexible and powerful templating engine for dynamic content generation.

scripts.build:parser: npx peggy --format es -o lib/parser.js --dts --extra-options-file peggy.config.json src/grammar.peggy
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:parser && npm run build:parser:new && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:standalone: npm run build && pkg --options no-warnings --output dist/template-engine --targets node20-linux-x64,node20-macos-x64,node20-win-x64 dist/cli.js
